To analyze your sleep cycle and record talking and snoring, Xiaomi Health needs permission to record audio.
For recording snoring and talking while analyzing sleep cycle
For recording talking and snoring while analyzing your sleep cycle
An yi nasarar ba da izini
"Taba '' Saittuna'' a kasa ka bude saittunan Xiaomi Health sai ka ba da izini da ake bukata."
Ka farka da yawa da dare.
Ka farka sau daya da dare. Daidai ne.
Farkawarka na dare na da tsawo kwarai.
A farkewar dare zai iya faruwa yayin barci. Tashin hankali akai-akai ko wahalar yin barci na iya janyo rarrabuwar barci kuma yana tasiri matuƙar ingancin barci.
"Taba '' Saittuna'' a kasa sai ka ba Xiaomi Health damar aiki akan bango."
Kun yi barci da wuri. Idan kuwa halin ku kun saba, zaku iya zama da ita kuma ku kyale wannan sakon.
"Lokacin bacci shine lokacin da za kuyi kwanciya ku sa wayarku. An ƙididdige shi gwargwadon lokacin kwanciyarka da amfani da na'urar."
Tanadin batir zai takaita ayyukan bango na Xiaomi Health. Bada dama Xiaomi Health don yayi aiki akan bango kullum don ka samu kididdiga daidai.
For providing services in the background
Copyright © Xiaomi Inc. All rights reserved.
"Za'a binciki zagayen barcin ka idan ka kwanta barci a wani karon"
Your deep sleep is too short

"When people sleep, periodic rapid eye movements occur. Sleep can be divided into rapid eye movement (REM) sleep and non-rapid eye movement (NREM) sleep. Deep sleep occurs during periods of NREM sleep, accounting for about 20 to 25%% of the overall sleep duration. Your brain rests during deep sleep, showing low levels of conscious activity, so waking up isn't easy."
Your deep sleep is too long
You have a sufficient amount of deep sleep
"This device is associated with Mi Account %s. If you can't find the device you need, add it in Mi Fit or Xiaomi Wear first."
Na isowa da shiga a cikin tsarin asusu
"Ba Xiaomi Health izinin farawa da kansa don ya iya samun sanarwa. Xiaomi Health zai sanar daku game da abubuwa masu muhimmanci kawai."
Ba da izini ma Xiaomi Health ya fara da kansa
Ba da izini ma Xiaomi Health ya fara da kansa
"Looks like you've already recorded weight during the selected time. Overwrite original data?"

"Barka da zuwa Xiaomi Health! \"Kantar takawa\" yana ba ku damar ganin takawar da kuke yin yayin rana, kamar yadda za a saita da kuma kula da manufofin ayyukanku. Dukkanin bayanan da suke da alaƙa za a adana su a cikin na'urarka, wanda zai baka damar sarrafa shi cikin sauƙi."

"If you don't agree to grant such permissions, you won't be able to use some features of this app; however, its basic functionality will still be available to you. You can always restrict permissions or revoke your authorization in the Settings."
"Xiaomi Health na bukatar isowa ga ma'jin don ya gabatar da ra'ayi."
Xiaomi Health na bada sabisi ma manyan kawai a yanzu.
Bisa ga Sharuddar Bayananmu, mafi karamcin shekara na amfani da wannan kaya na shekara 18.
Bisa ga Sharuddar Bayananmu, mafi karamcin shekara na amfani da wannan kaya na shekara 18.

"Barka da zuwa Xiaomi Health! ''Haila'' na ba ki damar nadin hailoli, tantancewa da ba da hasasshe na zuwan haila, da karbar tunatarwa. Za'a ajiye dukan bayanan dake da alaka akan na'urarka, wanda ke ba ka damar sarrafa shi da sauki."
"Na gano siffofin na'urar ta hanyar amfani da OAID da Android ID"
Allow this app to connect to the internet.
Get 7–9 hours of sleep every day
Idan ki neman b in sawun barci daidai, bada dama ma Xiaomi Health ya fara da kansa.
Barka da zuwa Xiaomi Health! Ku na iya amfani da wannan manhajar ku kidiya takawa, bin sawun takawa, haila, da nauyin jiki da kuma daidaita lissafin bayanan lafiyar jiki zuwa cloud.
Welcome to Xiaomi Health! You can use this app to count your steps, analyze sleep, track periods, record weight, and more.
An nada lokacin da kake magana a barci
Sha ruwa kuma ka yi tafiya.
Kamar da hayaniya da yawa a nan
Matsar zuwa wuri mara nutsuwa kuma sake gwadawa.
Guji wurare masu amo don yin karin lissafi daidai.
Za a dakatar da aikinku kuma a ci gaba kai tsaye ta hanyar sautunan da kuka samar.

According to Dietary Guidelines for Chinese Residents, daily physical activity should consume more than 15% of total energy expenditure. The energy spent on your daily physical activity is summarized here, but does not include basal metabolic expenditure. If you have weight management concerns, you need to focus on energy intake as well.

This is the time you spend on moderate and high intensity activities. According to the Chinese health authorities, weekly exercise duration should be at least 150 minutes (at least 30 minutes per session). Activities such as brisk walking (cadence greater than 100 steps per minute), running, and climbing stairs will be viewed as moderate to high intensity workouts.
"Selected data source (%1$s) doesn't provide Calorie count info. You can select a different data source in More > Data sources."
"Your current data source (%1$s) doesn't provide detailed workout stats. You can select another source in More > Data sources."
"Selected data source (%1$s) doesn't provide step count info. You can select a different data source in More > Data sources."
Provide your info to make stats more accurate
Carry your device with you throughout the day to track workouts automatically
"Today's steps: %d. Keep going to reach your goal!"

"1- Wasu irin na'urori ba su zo tare senso na rage cin wutar batir ba. Xiaomi Health ba ta bin sawun ayukanka don tanada batir akan wadannan na'urar: : Redmi 1S, Redmi 2A, Redmi 2, Redmi 3, Redmi Pro, Redmi Note, Redmi Note 2, Redmi Note 3, Redmi Note 4, Mi 2, Mi 3, Mi 4 Idan na'urar ka na cikin wannan jerin, kana iya kara asalin bayanai da kanka a cikin Xiaomi Health > Ma'adanai>Asalin bayanai> Yana kara asalin bayanai."
2. Occasionally, motion sensors may fail to mount. Reboot your phone and check whether tracking starts works normally in such cases.
Were you climbing stairs between %1$s and %2$s?
Stay healthier by gradually increasing your activity goal
Stay motivated by setting goals that you can achieve
Ba ka kai burin ka ba. Ci gaba da yi!
%1$d min(s) of exercise (%2$d Cal). Tap to view details.
"Today's step count: %1$d. You reached the goal!"
"Today's step count: %1$d. You can still reach the goal!"

According to the Dietary Guidelines for Chinese Residents, active physical activity should last at least 40 minutes a day, which is equivalent to walking 6000 steps. The steps you take each day to walk, run, and go upstairs are summarized here.
Da alama ba ku fara aiki ba tukuna. Gama wannan motsa jiki?

Farin bacci shine tsakanin tsakanin lokacin da kake bacci da kuma yin bacci gaba daya. Idan yana ɗaukar tsawon lokacin da kuka ɗauki minti 30 kafin bacci, wannan na iya zama alamar rashin bacci.Idan har yanzu yana da wahala kuyi bacci bayan minti 30 a gado, rage abubuwan da ke bayar da gudummawa ga wannan abin. Sha ƙasa da kofi; kada ku mamaye tsarin juyayi da gani ta hanji da kallon bidiyo ko karatu kafin kwanciya; Ka bar gidanka mai duhu, mai natsuwa, da kwanciyar hankali. Idan waɗannan matakan ba su kawo wani sauƙi ba, nemi likita.

Farin barci shine tsakanin lokacin da kake barci da kuma yin barci gaba daya. Sanin tsawon lokacin da zai dauke ku daga barci yana da mahimmanci don kula da rashin barci da sauran yanayin da ke da alaƙar barci.
"Bada dama ma Xiaomi Health don ka rubuta ma'aji waje don ka iya kaddamar da log wanda aka yi amfani dashi ma martani."
"Xiaomi Health ba zai iya ajiye rajistan ayyuka a ma'ajin waje. Ka ba Xiaomi Health izinin da ake bukata a cikin saittunan."
"Lokacin tashi shine lokacin da za ku tashi daga kan gado ku fara motsawa. An kimanta shi gwargwadon lokacin kwanciyarka da amfani da na'urar."
Kun tashi da wuri. Samun ƙarin barci zai fi muku kyau.
Kun makara. Barci da yawa baya da wani amfan ga lafiyar ku.
Ka yi barci akan lokac. Ci gaba!

You can start using Xiaomi Health after you turn 14
Bada wadannan bayanai don ka samu kidayar haila daidai
Ana kidiya cin lafiyar jiki bisa ga BMI ɗinku (ƙididdigar ƙwayar jikinku), da kuma yawan baccinku da ayyukan takawa. Mafi kusancin ku zuwa ga burin ku, mafi girman lafiyar jikinku ya kasance.

"Xiaomi Health is a system app. You can use this app to count steps, track sleep, periods, and weight, as well as sync your stats to the cloud. You won't be able to use this app after you uninstall it."
Rapid respiratory rate that allows you to finish short phrases
Ka na iya cin burin ka yau da kullum. Yi kokari ka sa wani fiye da haka.
Motsa jiki kuam ka samu barci so sai don saura da lafiya.

When people sleep, periodic rapid eye movements occur. Sleep can be divided into rapid eye movement (REM) sleep and non-rapid eye movement (NREM) sleep. Light sleep occurs during periods of NREM sleep, accounting for about 50 to 60%% of the overall sleep duration. During light sleep, consciousness is gradually reduced and the brain is relatively static, but it can still be woken up easily.
Your light sleep is too short
Your light sleep is too long
You have a sufficient amount of light sleep

A ina ya kamata ka saka wayarka?
Get accurate stats and helpful tips
Xiaomi Health na daidai da rana.
Your REM sleep is too long
Your REM sleep is too short

REM refers to the rapid eye movement. Sleep can be divided into rapid eye movement (REM) sleep and non-rapid eye movement (NREM) sleep. Rapid eye movement sleep accounts for about 20 to 25%% of the overall sleep duration. When people wake up at this stage, 74 to 95%% of them say that they have been dreaming and are able to remember their dreams. The brain is very active and the body is completely relaxed during REM sleep, which makes this sleep phase essential for maintaining cognitive functions.
Tsawon lokacin barci na REM na daidai
Dare yayi a yanzu. Lokacin barci yayi.

Hailar ki ya fara ko? Kar ki manta ki nada.

Lokacin tafiya ya kai! Sha ruwa ka yi tafiya.

Zabi ranar karewa na wannan haila

Za a dakatar da motsa jikinka kuma a ci gaba kai tsaye ta hanyar sautunan da kuka samar.
Mun kara karfin murya don ka ji umarni daidai.
"Idan na'urarka ta haɗu da %s, za ka iya zaɓar loda abin da aka yi rikodin a yayin motsa jiki don haɓaka lissafin aikin motsa jiki. Don kare sirrinka, za a ɓoye fayilolin mai jiwuwa."
Loda sauti don yin lissafi mafi daidaito
Bincike na dogon barci na kashe
"Couldn't track sleep. Placing your mobile device next to the pillow will make sleep data more accurate."
Sleep tracking consumes only about 1% of your battery per night
"Tabbatar cewa na'urarka ta cika caji kafin ka kwanta. Batteryarancin baturi na iya dakatar da bin diddigin bacci."
Place your device next to you when you sleep to track body movements and generate sleep cycle stats.
"Lissafin ba zai daidai ba ba tare da tasara lokacin barci ba. "
"Idan aka saita lokacin barci, an bi sawun barcinka da kansa. "
"Don samun daidaitattun lissafi, sa na'urarka a gefensa ko ƙarƙashin matashin kai kuma ka tabbata cewa bai wuce 50 cm ba daga jikinka."
Sa nakurar kusa da matashin ka
Ana ba da Stats don tunani kawai. Ba za a iya amfani da su a matsayin filaye don binciken lafiya ba.
"Irin na'urori daban daban na kunshe da senso daban-daban. Darajar cin karfin batir na iya bambanta ga abubuwan masarufi daban-daban."
"Me yasa na'urori daban-daban suna cinye adadin wutar batir daban-daban don bin sawun barci?"

"Lokacin da aka kashe na'urarka, sake maimaitawa, ko batirin ya yi ƙasa, za a dakatar da bin sawun barci saboda abubuwan senso ba za su iya tattara bayanai ba. A irin waɗannan halayen, lissafin barci ba zai yi daidai ba. Idan wannan matsalar ta faru sau da yawa, duba na'urarka don ayyukan kashewa ko sabunta sisyten na dare."

"Deep and light sleep phases are detected based on body movement data collected by the sensors of your device. Here's why you might not be able to see the stats: 1. Xiaomi Health couldn't collect data. This might happen when your device powers off while you're sleeping, its battery is too low, or the app isn't allowed to work in the background. Allow Xiaomi Health to autostart, add it to Battery saver exceptions, and lock it in the background to prevent this from happening. 2. Xiaomi Health couldn't analyze the collected data. This might happen when your phone is placed too far from your body when you sleep. Alternatively, your body movement might be too subtle to make any assumptions about your sleep cycle changes. We're constantly improving our algorithms to make Xiaomi Health analyze your sleep better."
Me ya sa lissafin bai daidai?
"Why don't I see sleep cycle stats?"

"Na'urar ku tana lura da motsin jikin ku yayin bacci ta amfani da senso. Don yin lissafi mafi daidaito, sa na'urar a kan wuri mai taushi kusa da jikinka. Guji sawa shi a kan teburin kusa da gado ko kuma yin nesa da katifa."
Yaya zan sa lissafina ya yi daidai?
"Ana nazarin hanyoyin baccinku akan na'urar a cikin gida. Binciken barci zai yi aiki ko da ba a haɗa ku da hanyar sadarwa ba ko kuma an dakatar da haɗin ku na yau."
Shin zan iya yin haɗin intanet don bincika zagayowa na barci?
Xiaomi Health na bin sawun baccinka a cikin bango
Ba ka riga ka fara bin sawun barcinka ba tukunna.

"Sleep duration is the time when you aren't awake during the day. Generally, adults should sleep for 7-9 hours, while teenagers need to sleep longer than adults. Getting enough sleep is essential for good health and wellbeing."
Kun yi barci kasa da awanni 7. Samun ƙarin bacci zai fi muku kyau.
Samun barci ƙasa da awowi 6 bai ishe ku ba.
Ka yi barci fiye da yadda ya kamata
Miao Health ke bada shawarwari na kimanta barci
Set reminders for going to bed and getting up
"Current settings won't guarantee you %1$s %2$s of sleep daily. You need more than that."

Ba da izinin da ake bukata don bayanan barci su yi daidai

Xiaomi Health za ta yi rikodin barcinka ta kanta dangane da amfanin wayarka, ƙididdigar ayyukan, da kuma lokacin yin barci da farkawa da aka saita.
"Kunna maballin'' Bin sawun barci'' canza don ka fara nadin bayanan barcinka"
Ba da dama ma Xiaomi Health don ku bi sawun ayyuka da barci.

Xiaomi Health can record snoring and talking automatically based on your bedtime schedule. The recording will stop when you get up.
You can turn this feature off in the Settings anytime.
Your snoring and talking will be recorded automatically when you go to sleep.
Turn on to keep 100 MB of the latest recordings on this device and delete older ones automatically to save storage space.
An offline algorithm is used for detecting snoring and talking. All recordings will be stored locally on this device without disclosing your private info.
"Remember that using this feature consumes a substantial amount of power. It's a good idea to keep your charger connected while you sleep to avoid unexpected interruptions."
Detect snoring and talking to learn more about your sleep
